message.content:
<OUTPUT_TEXT>
Subject: Resolution of Shipping Discrepancies – Immediate Action Required

Dear [Client/Establishment Representative Name],

I am writing to address recent issues identified with your shipment, specifically regarding damages, shortages, and items not conforming to the agreed specifications.

Upon receipt and inspection of the latest delivery (Reference: [Shipment/Invoice Number]), our team noted the following discrepancies:
- [List specific damages, shortages, or nonconforming items, including quantities and item descriptions.]

To rectify these issues promptly, we kindly request your assistance with the following:
1. Please confirm receipt of this memo and acknowledge the discrepancies listed.
2. Advise on your preferred course of action—whether replacement, credit, or return of affected items.
3. If applicable, provide any additional documentation or instructions required for processing claims or returns.

We are committed to resolving these matters efficiently and maintaining the high standards of our partnership. Please respond at your earliest convenience so we may proceed accordingly.

Thank you for your attention and cooperation.

Best regards,

[Your Name]  
Senior Shipping, Receiving, and Inventory Clerk  
[Your Company Name]  
[Contact Information]
</OUTPUT_TEXT>
